Text: I never thought I could stand a 2 hr+ instrumental concert (with some vocals here and ther) without feeling bored.. Steve Vai and his new band really nailed this one.. Its a masterpiece of musicianship.. Of course, the sound and video quality is very good.. Thanks man

Here is the MP4-Rip with dual audio (Concert & Commentary) by me :
